entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adding editorconfig then re-opening results in massively edited editorconfig #58616
    17.1
  • Adding editorconfig via Add Item menu shows error #58615
    17.1
  • GUI Editor for editorconfig files doesn't work. #58614
    17.1
  • editorconfig editor window does not show correct file Location #58613
    17.2
  • InvalidOperationException: WaitAndGetResult cannot be called from a thread pool thread #58612
    17.1
  • Adding an editorconfig throws exception #58611
    17.2
  • .editorconfig File Editor Has Issue if No .cs Files Exist #58610
    17.2
  • C# Code Style Options (general) are not correctly saved #58609
    17.2
  • VS 2022 : saving 'Code Style' option is not correct #58608
    17.2
  • View.Modified desynch editing .editorconfig #58607
    17.2
  • NullReferenceException in AbstractRemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #58606
    17.2
  • F7 (switch to text-view) not working in .editor Config Editor in VIsual Studio 2022 #58605
    17.2
  • Null array constant in metadata causes overflow in attribute decoding #58598
  • Possible bug for `ParameterSyntax.Update` API around `exclamationExclamationToken` behavior #58597
  • Add codefix for `ERR_StructHasInitializersAndNoDeclaredConstructor` (CS8983) #58593
    17.2
  • Wrong, Unclear and not helpful WorkspaceDiagnostic errors reported for .csproj projects based on versions below .NET 5.0 #58592
    17.2
  • Using CompletionService.GetDescriptionAsync there are a lot of xmlExceptions #58589
    17.2
  • Invalid null-checked parameter syntax doesn't cause errors. #58585
    17.1

Closed

  • Member access inside object creation inserts unwanted parentheses #58574
    17.1
  • Code fix to move a type to another file also migrates the `#nullable X` directive, removing it from the original file #58533
  • VS 2017 RC - move type to file bug #32428
    Backlog
  • "Move type to file" can bring along #endregion directive, resulting in non-compiling code #57077
    Backlog
  • NullableWalker: operator inference shouldn't infer from target typed conditional expresion #58369
    17.1
  • Target-typed new expressions don't update their types with nullability #49736
    17.1
  • Allow non-fatal error reports to include FaultSeverity #57699
    17.1
  • Source generators cannot use a hint name with valid metadata naming convention characters #58476
    Compiler.Next
  • Null-forgiving operator (!) does not work if it is used before an actual warning #58603
  • confusion over whether string is nullable #57974
  • Stack overflow through type forwarder #58517
    17.1
  • [Proposal] Compiler generated `IEnumerator` implementations should be `struct` sometimes #57903
  • Roslyn emits unnecessary conv.u opcodes over transient pointers #57970
  • why can't the source generator be used in the net6.0? #57990
  • Source generators don't work with visual studio 2022 #58000
  • Compiler is not picking up the extension method defined. #58001
  • "Unused private member" fires on private constants that are used by attributes #48109
    Backlog
  • Missing items in Task List #50084
    Backlog
  • Preprocessor Directives in .csproj files get rejected when they contain line breaks or white space. #58391
  • Lambdas + custom delegate types + type inference = breaking change in C# 10 #57916
  • 'is' operator reports seemingly wrong results for interface over enum array #58378

PullRequests

Created

  • Make TryNavigateToMetadataSymbol asynchronous #58617
    Area-IDE
  • Correctly handle null array constants from source and metadata #58604
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58601
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove FileTextLoaderOptions #58596
    Area-IDE
  • Handle globalconfig files correctly in configuration code actions #58591
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Fix MemoryExtensions.TrimStart #58587
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58584
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Fix NRE in CompletionListUpdater #58602
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Simplify WorkCoordinator #58595
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Refactor IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor usage in MethodCompiler #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • use pair-wise testing on PR validation #57657
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New, Next
  • Allow valid metadata name characters in source generator hint names #58506
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58599
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Exclude service config files for .Net 6 host from ServiceHub folder #58580
    Area-IDE, Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Fix setting InBreakState flag #58436
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58582
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix incremental build failures #58429
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Break binding cycles caused by type forwarders. #58535
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • CodeFixContext cleanup #58565
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove CS1574 suppression #50365
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58590
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix branch URLs in Language Feature Status #58011
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58586
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58583
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58618
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid race condition in map for TupleElementIndex #58500
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Tuples
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers
  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Use interpolated string handler for Contract.ThrowIf methods #58173
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1535636 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • List patterns: Slice value is assumed to be never null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns
  • don't include implicit/explicit keywords when completing explicit interface operator #53938
    Area-IDE, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Report AdditionalLocations for CS8618 (uninitialized non-nullable member) #58096
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Extend TypeDeclarationStructureTests with records #48161
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.2
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
